dct_title_s: LES TROIS POSITIONS DE LA SPHERE veiies en Convexe lóeil étant posé á distance infinie du Zenith
dct_description_sm: Includes bibliographical references (p. xv-xvi) and indexes.

Six hemispherical representations of the earth. The middle map on the right hand page depicts a north pole projection showing California as an unnamed island. Issued on a page with two large hemisphere maps. The six smaller hemispheres are positioned in a line below the large maps.
See general notes. A Paris : Aux Galleries du Louvre Vis à Vis St. Nicolas avec Privilege pour Vingt Ans, 1695.

Three hemispherical representations taken from the right side of the 1695 map. With “fol 34” (top left). “Par le Sr. P. Moullart-Sanson Geog. Aux Galleries du Louvre” (lower right). Issued in: Introduction a la geographie in plusieurs cartes avec leur explication. / Par Les Srs Sanson, Geographes ordinaires du Roy. -- A Paris : Dans le cloitre de St. Nicolas du Louvre, MDCCVII [1707].
"Par le Sr. P. Moullart-Sanson Geog. Aux Galleries du Louvre"
Glen McLaughlin with Nancy H. Mayo.
